entry.title: Run Boy Run
entry.summary:
Author: myswordhandissinging

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,097Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 634

Summary: Stiles Stilinski knew he should have stayed in to finish his assignment that was due on Monday. Instead, he had to go investigate with the pack. He knew he was going to regret it later, and he probably should have listened to his instincts. When he goes missing, the pack finds him in the same spot after days of searching. ¬† Or the one where Stiles goes missing for a couple of days and comes back blind and with magical powers. What did that bitch do to him? ¬† *This was first published in 2013 as a teenager. Now, as an adult with a developed frontal lobe, the age difference between Derek and Stiles is only 2 years, with Stiles as an 18-year-old high school senior and Derek being 20-years-old.

entry.title: Mythical As They Are
entry.summary:
Author: StarStruckFears

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,340Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

Summary: Prince Derek Hale has always known that myths walk closer to truth than anyone realizes ‚Äî after all, he carries one inside his own skin. When tradition demands he sail in search of a siren‚Äôs trophy before his coronation, Derek expects lies, forged scales, and hollow ceremony.What he does not expect is to drown.Or to be saved by something beautiful, golden-eyed, and impossible.One scale ignites a legend. One miracle awakens a longing. And when Derek returns to the sea in search of the creature who stole his breath, he finds far more than a myth waiting for him beneath the waves.

entry.title: Fingers Crossed
entry.summary:
Author: UnknownXFuture

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 450,194Chapters: 39/40Kudos: 1,060

Summary: ‚ÄúHave you ever heard of the butterfly effect?‚Äù Stiles looked up and shook his head. ‚ÄúNo‚Ä¶ what is it?‚Äù ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs the idea that the smallest of situations, can set the biggest consequences in motion. A butterfly flapping it‚Äôs wings on one side of the world, creates a hurricane on the other.‚Äù He nodded, that‚Äôs exactly how this situation sounds right now. If he and Scott never went out that fateful night and looked for that body, or if he and Derek never became friends, or hell, if he never agreed to Deatons plan in the first place‚Ä¶ then none of this would be happening. entry.title: A Flower Made Of Iron
entry.summary:
Author: XOLissy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 762,663Chapters: 29/?Kudos: 46

Summary: Are you living or just surviving? Eden Parker was just your average human boy. The type who goes to school and steers clear of trouble. That is, until hidden memories are awakened and secrets are revealed. Follow Eden on his rocky journey through the supernatural world, finding his soulmates, and the return of his long lost older brother. entry.title: Rake
entry.summary:
Author: Vampire_Finch

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,503Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 90

Summary: Au Regency Romance 1820 England. Explicit M/M sex scenes. Viscount Derek Hale has a notorious reputation as a dallier, a trifler, a breaker of Omega hearts and tarnisher of reputatiions, yet devishly handsome, charming and good -natured he is adored by London society. He is the type of aristocratic Alpha young Omega dabeutantes are warned to avoid at all costs. Stiles Stilinski is the 16 year old Omega son of Baron Noah Stilinski and his wife, Claudia. Taken to London for his debut into The Season and make a 'perfect match', Stiles is strenuously warned against any association with Viscount Hale by his cousin and Mother. Accepted into The Ton, Stiles inevitably meets Viscount Hale and more than sparks fly. Can Stiles preserve his and his family's reputation and tame a wild heart or become another notch on the Viscount's bedpost?
